  * Velocity
  * StringTemplate
  * Jamon

  * Smarty
  * Jinja
  * PHP TAL

  * XQuery
  * [openArchitectureWare http://www.openarchitectureware.org]
  * [Acceleo http://wiki.eclipse.org/Acceleo]
